title: Judge, Vol. 1
description: Envy, lust, sloth, wrath, gluttony, pride, greed.A group of sinners who bear the guilt of the seven deadly sins has been gathered in an old courthouse to face judgement. To leave this place alive, they must offer up a sacrificeâ€”one of their number. As the trial begins, who will the gavel fall on first?
author: Yoshiki Tonogai
